授業目的:
The main purpose of this course is to improve and develop students’ communication skills and confidence to use English in personal, professional, and academic contexts. Although the course will focus primarily on spoken communication, lessons will also aim at developing listening, reading, and writing skills to achieve and reinforce communicative goals.
Lesson goals and tasks will be centered around a wide variety of opics relevant to student interests.
Students will be encouraged to develop their intercultural awareness by critically thinking about and expressing their ideas from personal, global, and cultural perspectives. In-class communication and other activities will aim at improving students’ capacity to work collaboratively and in cooperation with classmates. Students will be required to plan, organize, and deliver two presentations, one individual, and one in cooperation with their classmates.
到達目標:
Students will improve and build their confidence to use English communicatively in a variety of situations and contexts.
Students will improve their spoken English fluency: improving speaking, listening, reading, and writing skills needed for effective communication in a variety of situations.
Students will improve their lexical range by learning and using vocabulary related to course content.
Students will improve their critical thinking skills and will improve their intercultural awareness by exploring and sharing ideas from personal, global, and cultural perspectives.
Students will develop and use the skills required to deliver an effective presentation.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Course will be aimed at a face to face format, but methods of studying online will also be provided
Students will be required to do in-class activities individually and collaboratively, and complete homework as required.

トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to complete a minimum of one or more hours of homework per lesson, outside of class time.
